name: Misty Salazar
text: The best pizzas ever! They have a wide variety that will satisfy every possible pizza lovers dreams

name: mike miller
text: loved this place but it is now a vacant building, Nearest one is in Tyler. The owner needs to come to this site and update the listing to "closed" Evidently reviewers cannot do it because several other people have noted that it is closed but you have to dig through the reviews to find them . 12/19

name: Sherri Mitchell
text: I purchased the Cowboy Pizza... Which was wonderful after baking it at home.  The employees offered suggestions and were very helpful with baking tips. I will recommend Papa Murphy's to others.

name: Shirlesa' Carroll
text: They're pretty good for my first time there. The food is good.

name: Carolyn Richardson Johnson
text: They wear gloves when making the pizza. Great toppings, like homemade. Pizza only takes 10 to 12 minutes. It's fresh and delicious

name: Kevin Howard
text: It's 1753 NW Loop 281. [Edit] They are now permanently closed. Location in Tyler is still open.

name: Danny Vestal
text: Really good pizza! A little on the pricey side, but what are ya going to do? All in all, a good pizza!

name: Natasha Garrett
text: This place is always a great idea if you want to take pizza home and bake it...

name: Michelle Allen
text: Very clean and very friendly and they r the best in town

name: Tommy Goforth
text: A bit pricey but really tasty pizza

name: Paul Bynum
text: Bare minimum of being ok. This franchise owner needs to listen to his customer base and put the popular menu items back on deal

name: Kim Webb
text: Love the pizza here. Staff has been on point with me and my order every time. Side note not all ovens are created equal, and we had to turn ours down 25 degrees from the recommended heat for the crust to cook perfectly.

name: Timothy McClelland
text: Great pizza made with all fresh ingredients!  Very tasty!

name: Tina Jarvis
text: PERFECT EVERYTIME!  I have ordered from this location many times since starting my job here in Longview over 2 years ago.  Always friendly and welcoming staff that are eager to customize your pizza just how you like it.  My husband was â€¦More

name: Brenda Underhill
text: Love buying my pizza here actually get to watch them prepare your food

name: Michael Gasperik
text:
The employees here are awesome

text: I purchased a large light Herb Chicken Mediterranean on a Friday night. Did not realize the toppings had been placed in the middle of the pizza. Once I took the pizza out of the oven I noticed the crust would not cook. We ended up not â€¦More

name: Mitchell Jaggar
text: Really like the pizza but today there was only employee and desperately needed help and he said he couldn't get ahold of his boss. Too about 30 minutes just to make 2 pizzas

name: Lindsey S
text: The pizza has been a favorite of ours for years. It's fresh and ready to pick up. I just called in an order and the employee who took my call was a real jerk and less than pleasant to begin with. It went downhill from there, him telling me â€¦More

name: Will Webb
text: Always a good choice. Friendly staff, pretty good pizza.

text: Great place

text: my family loves papa Murphy's. they dont skip on the fixings
